snippet: A 22-year-old man was arrested on a felony warrant charging him with murder in the fatal shooting of the Auburn football player Mitchell on Sunday, the police in Auburn, Ala., said.
abstract: Police in Auburn, Ala, charge Markale Deandra Hart with murder in shooting death of Auburn football player Jakell Lenard Mitchell; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: A 22-year-old man was arrested on a felony warrant charging him with murder in the fatal shooting of the Auburn football player Mitchell on Sunday, the police in Auburn, Ala., said.

headline.main: Auburn Player, Jakell Lenard Mitchell, Is Killed
